name: The Darkrooms
description:
Ph.D. Physicist Elizabeth Fizeau find herself in a strange reality after testing a physics experiment with her co-workers at the International Institute of Physics. She awakens in a empty office building but something feels wrong.  The space smells of wet carpet and mold, the wallpaper is dingy, the overhead florescent lights are headache inducing, and none of her colleagues are to be found.  It appears the Ms. Fizeau has no-clipped to The Darkrooms. Will she ever find her way out?

Controls:Key:Walk ForwardWWalk BackwardSWalk LeftAWalk RightDSprintShiftTurn on FlashlightEPick up Key CardQSetting MenuESC

Hint: Use the overhead lights to replenish your sanity meter.
